description: The Mobile Router state change notification. This
notification is sent when the Mobile Router has
undergone a state change from its previous
state of Mobile IP. Generation of this notification
is controlled by the cmiTrapControl object.

event.Summary: CMI mobile router's state of mobile IP: $v1

description: Indicates mobile node's state of Mobile IP:
home
-- MN is connected to home network.
registered
-- MN has registered on foreign network
pending
-- MN has sent registration request and is
waiting for the reply
isolated
-- MN is isolated from network
unknown
-- MN can not determine its state.
variables.name: MIP-MIB::mnState

description: The Mobile Router care-of-address change notification.
This notification is sent when the Mobile Router has
changed its care-of-address. Generation of this
notification is controlled by the cmiTrapControl
object.
Care-of address for the registration.
variables.name: MIP-MIB::mnRegCOA

description: IP address of the agent as used in the destination
IP address of the Registration Request. The agent
may be a home agent or a foreign agent.
variables.name: MIP-MIB::mnRegAgentAddress

description: The Mobile Router new agent discovery notification.
This notification is sent when the Mobile Router has
heard an agent advertisement from a new mobile agent.
Generation of this notification is controlled by the
cmiTrapControl object.

event.Summary: Mobile Router detected new mobile agent

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiMrNewMA CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiMrMaIsHa i 1 CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiMrMaAdvFlags b 1 CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiMrMaAdvRcvIf i 9999

description: Indicates whether the mobile agent is a home agent for
the mobile router or not. If true, it means that the
agent is one of the mobile router's configured home
agents.
variables.name: CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiMrMaIsHa

description: The flags contained in the 7th byte in the extension of
the most recently received mobility agent advertisement:
reverseTunnel
-- Agent supports reverse tunneling
gre
-- Agent offers Generic Routing Encapsulation
minEnc
-- Agent offers Minimal Encapsulation
foreignAgent
-- Agent is a Foreign Agent
homeAgent
-- Agent is a Home Agent
busy
-- Foreign Agent is busy
regRequired
-- FA registration is required.
variables.name: CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiMrMaAdvFlags

description: The ifIndex value from Interfaces table of MIB II for
the interface of mobile router on which the
advertisement from the mobile agent was received.
variables.name: CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiMrMaAdvRcvIf

description: The MN registration request failed notification.
This notification is sent when the registration
request from MN is rejected by Home Agent.

event.Summary: Mobile node ($v7) registration request failed because of $v8

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiHaMnRegReqFailed CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiNtRegCOAType i 0 CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiNtRegCOA s EXAMPLE CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiNtRegHAAddrType i 0 CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiNtRegHomeAgent s EXAMPLE CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiNtRegHomeAddressType i 0 CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiNtRegHomeAddress a 192.0.2.1 CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiNtRegNAI s EXAMPLE CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiNtRegDeniedCode i 128

description: Represents the type of the address stored in
cmiHaRegMnCOA.
variables.name: CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiNtRegCOAType

description: The Mobile Node's Care-of address.
variables.name: CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiNtRegCOA

description: Represents the type of the address stored in
cmiHaRegMnHa.
variables.name: CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiNtRegHAAddrType

description: The Mobile Node's Home Agent address.
variables.name: CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiNtRegHomeAgent

description: Represents the type of the address stored in
cmiHaRegRecentHomeAddress.
variables.name: CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiNtRegHomeAddressType

description: Home (IP) address of visiting mobile node.
variables.name: CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiNtRegHomeAddress

description: The identifier associated with the mobile node.
variables.name: CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiNtRegNAI

description: The Code indicating the reason why the most recent
Registration Request for this mobile node was rejected
by the home agent.
variables.name: CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiNtRegDeniedCode

description: This notification is generated when the registration
request from an MN is rejected by the home agent, and
the total number of registrations on the home agent
has already reached the maximum number of allowed
bindings represented by cmiHaMaximumBindings.

event.Summary: Home agent rejected MN registration request because it reached maximum registrations limit $v2

description: The current number of entries in
haMobilityBindingTable. haMobilityBindingTable
contains the home agent's mobility binding list.
The home agent updates this table in response to
registration events from mobile nodes.
variables.name: CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiHaRegTotalMobilityBindings

description: This object represents the maximum number of
registrations allowed by the home agent.
variables.name: CISCO-MOBILE-IP-MIB::cmiHaMaximumBindings
